parameters: I'm still surprised at how homey they've been able to make this place.
Almost every "Mess Hall" I've been in has certainly lived up to the title.
I wonder what kinda food they serve...
Ha, "four people?!" More like one girl!
My tummy's really been outdoing herself lately!
Like, Pops always said I had an appetite but wow...
I never had a chance to eat like that at home.
Honestly, I'm just amazed at how much can fit in there...
Still, it's nothing compared to how much those guys made me eat at
Don't worry, girl, I won't overload you like that again...
What's that? You want another one?
I've been eating so much lately, it might not be such a good idea...
What if I started getting fat?
I guess you're right, it's not THAT big a deal.
One more meat pie, coming right up!
(Did you get that thing to work?)
(I've been trying, but nothing's happening. What do you think?)
(You probably just don't even know how to use it properly.)
(As if your knack for this kind of stuff is any better than mine!)
(Come on, let's talk about this outside.)
What're those guys acting all sneaky for?
Oh... I know I shouldn't do anything risky without Merc, but... I
And if they ARE up to something bad... I can just tell Merc! I mean,
he should be SOMEWHERE close by.
Hello and welcome to Fort Hyde's very own Mess Hall! I'm Torny. What

If you need a recommendation, you could always try our famous Hyde's
Meat Pie! It's full of rabbit, chicken, plenty of potatoes and vegetables,

It's made just the way General Hyde himself liked it! It's our pride
In fact, today we'll be having our annual meat pie festival in celebration

No, no, I want a whole pie.
Did you mean a mini pie? Our whole meat pies are big enough to feed

Yeah, I'll just have some of those chicken sandwiches you got. Make
Man, this meat pie is great!
Merc, you should totally get some whenever you have the chance, there's
just so much STUFF inside of it!
Plus this whole thing's bigger than my head!
Yeah, maybe some other time. I ain't feelin' too hot right now.
That's what I'm sayin'! If you wanna start feeling better sooner put
I'm sorry, I couldn't help but overhear! \}I'm just nosy like that...\{ Did you just say
that you weren't feeling well, young man? What seems to be the
Nah, it's just a sore back. You get used to this kinda stuff when you're
Oh, see it's THAT kind of thinking that I can't stand. That's it!
I'm taking you, whether you like it or not!
Hey, wait, I haven't even finished eat-\.\.\^
Hold your horses! You and I need to have a serious talk about
Young lady, I apologize for borrowing your friend so suddenly like
this, I hope you don't mind.
HEY! OW! LET GO OF MY EAR! AT LEAST LET ME STAND UP AND WALK
I can stand to wait in line. I'm patient.
What's more, I know exactly what I'm going to order.
You two are visiting, aren't you?
It should go without saying, but, try the meat pies. I can assure
you that none make them better than we do.
What to order... I don't want people to look at me funny...
I'm taking a break from the construction work. A good ol'
Wow... so many... vegetables to choose from!
(She tries not to make eye contact with you.)
Something I'm really excited for is the upcoming Port Festival!
We always make sure to show up with these pies and everybody loves

Please ask up front for a kids' menu.

I mean, they're GOOD, but they're not my preference, you understand?
These mini meat pies? I honestly like 'em more than the big ones!
I think it's the novelty of being able to eat an entire one in one
I've gotta say, one of the most impressive things we've come up
with here in Fort Hyde is the bread bar.
I know that salad bars are a thing elsewhere, but a bread bar?
A list of drinks to order.
I'm a traveling gourmet. I like to go around and review restaurants
and food places to see if they're up to snuff!
These meat pies are incredibly filling and hearty!
You must have the fortitude of a warrior in order to finish one off,
